result.heading: FOR THE FIRST TIME IN DON'T LET THEM IN FOREVER

direction.raw_text: ELSA FOR THE FIRST TIME IN                  DON'T LET THEM IN FOREVER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . WORLD                                  CONCEAL. DON'T FEEL. A CHANCE TO FIND TRUE LOVE             DON'T LET THEM KNOW. -Anna hurries over the bridge and into the village square.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I KNOW IT ALL ENDS TOMORROW, SO IT HAS TO BE TODAY!! `CAUSE FOR THE FIRST TIME IN FOREVER. . .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! -Anna SLAMS right into the breast of a HORSE! She falls back and lands in a small wooden boat. It tips off of the dock. She's heading overboard. But just then, the horse slams his hoof into the boat and steadies it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry. Are you hurt? The rider, HANS, sure is handsome and regal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. I-ya, no. No. I'm okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I just wasn't looking where I was going. But I'm okay. He hops down from his horse and steps into the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm great, actually.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, thank goodness. He offers her a hand and their eyes meet. Chemistry. He helps her to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Hans of the Southern Isles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Anna of Arendelle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess...? My Lady. He drops to his knees, head bowed. The horse bows too, curling his hoof up and out of the boat. The boat tips. Hans tumbles on top of Anna. Awkward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi...again. The horse slams his foot back into the boat to stabilize it. Anna and Hans tumble the other way. Anna lands on top of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. This is awkward. Not you're awkward, but just because we're-- I'm awkward. You're gorgeous. (did she just say that?) Wait, what? Hans quickly gets to his feet and helps Anna up again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to formally apologize for hitting the Princess of Arendelle with my horse...and for every moment after.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No-no. It's fine. I'm not THAT Princess. I mean, if you'd hit my sister Elsa, that would be-- yeash! `Cuz, you know... (patting the horse) Hello. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, lucky you, it's-it's just me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just you? Hans smiles, amused. She smiles back. The bells RING. She doesn't notice at first; she's too busy drinking in Hans's handsomeness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...The bells. The coronation. I-I-I better go. I have to...I better go. She hurries off, stops, turns back. Gives Hans a little wave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye! As she rushes off again, Hans waves back. The horse waves too, once again taking his hoof out of the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no. The boat falls, with Hans in it. SPLASH! It lands upside down in the water. Hans raises it up off of him, gasping for air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. CHURCH CHAPEL -- DAY Elsa stands at the alter. Anna stands off to one side. She peeks out to the audience. Hans waves at her from the pews. He's changed his clothes. The crown is placed on Elsa's head. The scepter and orb are presented to Elsa on a pillow. She slowly reaches for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty, the gloves. Elsa hesitates. She breathes nervously, removes her gloves, places them on the pillow. Her hands shake. She takes the orb and scepter, then turns to the people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sehm hon HELL-drr IN-um HELL-gum AYG-num ok krund ee THES-um HELL- gah STAHTH, ehk teh frahm FUR-ear U- thear...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee The scepter and orb start to freeze over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Queen Elsa of Arendelle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queen Elsa of Arendelle. Just in time. Elsa manages to set the orb and scepter back down on the pillow before anyone notices the ice. She picks up her gloves and slips them on. She made it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. GREAT HALL -- NIGHT Springy music fills the Great Hall. Guests dance. Eat. Laugh. TRUMPETS SOUND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queen Elsa of Arendelle. Elsa enters, poised and looking surprisingly content. She stands under a formal awning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Anna of Arendelle! Anna runs into the room, waves awkwardly. Kai ushers her over to stand right next to Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here? Are you sure? She and Elsa sneak awkward peeks at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi me...? Oh. Um. Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You look beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. You look beautifuller. I mean, not fuller. You don't look fuller, but more beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. They look out at the celebration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, this is what a party looks like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's warmer than I thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what is that amazing smell? They both close their eyes and inhale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Chocolate. Their eyes pop open. They laugh. Elsa looks back out at the party. Anna looks at Elsa. She wants to say so much, but she can't think of where to start. Just as she finds her way, Kai interrupts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty. The Duke of Weaseltown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weselton. The Duke of Weselton. (to Elsa) Your Majesty, as your closest partner in trade, it seems only fitting that I offer you your first dance as queen. The Duke does a funny flitter of his feet, a hitch-kick, and a deep bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One, two, three. Jump. As he holds out his hand, head down, his toupee dips forward. Anna giggles. Elsa looks at Anna, stifles a giggle herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you...only I don't dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But my sister does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucky you....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't think-- The Duke grabs Anna's arm and yanks her away before she can protest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you swoon, let me know, I'll catch you. Anna looks back at Elsa, desperately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. OUT ON THE DANCE FLOOR: The Duke showboats, but he's just awful. Anna tries to make the best of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like an agile peacock... CLUCK- CLUGGLE-CLUCK! He lands on her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow. Ow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Speaking of, so great to have the gates open. Why did they shut them in the first place? Do you know the reason? Hmm? He gets in her face, suspicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, all right. Hang on. They don't call me the little dipper for nothing. He dips Anna back. Elsa peeks through the crowd, can barely hold in her laughter. Anna shoots Elsa funny, help-me looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a chicken...with the face of a monkey...I fly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : MOMENTS LATER... Anna limps back to Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me know when you're ready for another round, M'Lady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, he was sprightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Especially for a man in heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never been better. This is so nice. I wish it could be like this all the time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too.... But then Elsa catches herself. She stiffens up, looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not? If--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It just can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Anna's smile drops. She tries not to get emotional.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me for a minute. She walks away. Elsa watches her go, saddened. Moving through the crowd, Anna gets bumped by a bowing man's butt. She falls. Just before she hits the floor, Hans catches her. He smiles perfectly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Glad I caught you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hans. He smoothly sets his drink down on a passing tray. He lifts her up and leads her in a romantic dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER: Anna and Hans drink and chat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I often had the whole parlor to myself to slide... Oops. Sorry. She hits him in the face by mistake with her hand. He laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : -THE CASTLE DOORS: Anna and Hans stroll out of the castle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Your physique helps I'm sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : -THE ROSE GARDEN... Hans notices her white streak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was born with it, although I dreamt I was kissed by a troll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 25 FROZEN - J. Lee EXT. BALCONY -- NIGHT Anna teaches Hans how to eat krumkake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, the whole thing! You got it. They laugh as the krumkake crumbles in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay wait, wait. So you have how many brothers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Twelve older brothers. Three of them pretended I was invisible... literally...for two years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's horrible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's what brothers do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And sisters. Elsa and I were really close when we were little. But then, one day she just shut me out, and I never knew why. He takes her hand. Leans in close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I would never shut you out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, can I just say something crazy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love crazy. "Love is an Open Door"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking the same thing, because like. . . (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'VE BEEN SEARCHING MY WHOLE LIFE TO FIND MY OWN PLACE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They jump to the neighboring balcony and enter a door. They come out on top of one of the castle's towers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LOVE IS AN OPEN DOOR!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Cut to them sliding across an empty hallway in their socks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LOVE IS AN OPEN DOOR ANNA WITH YOU!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They hop up on the castle roof and watch a shooting star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I was gonna say! They slide down the back of the roof out of sight. We next find them strutting on a bridge ledge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jinx.. . .jinx again. Are they doing the robot? No. They're imitating the mechanical figures on the clock tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OUR MENTAL SYNCHRONIZATION CAN HAVE BUT ONE EXPLANATION, HANS YOU- ANNA AND I- HANS WERE- ANNA JUST- BOTH MEANT TO BE. Anna and Hans dance on top of the lighthouse and cast dancing shadows across the sails of ships in the docks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WE DON'T HAVE TO FEEL IT ANYMORE!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DOOR! LOVE IS AN OPEN DOOR! They climb to the waterfall looking out over the kingdom. Anna raises up her hands to frame the moon. Hans puts his hands on top of hers. Together their hands form a heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LIFE CAN BE SO MUCH MORE- ANNA WITH YOU!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I say something crazy...? Will you marry me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I just say something even crazier? Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 29 FROZEN - J. Lee INT. BALL -- NIGHT Anna pushes through the crowd towards Elsa, Hans in tow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops! Pardon. Sorry. Can we just get around you there? Thank you. Oh, there she is. Elsa! Elsa turns to Anna. Anna curtseys awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean...Queen.... Me again. Um. May I present Prince Hans of the Southern Isles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty. Elsa gives a polite but reserved curtsey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We would like--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --your blessing--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: --our marriage!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marriage...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, I'm confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we haven't worked out all the details ourselves. We'll need a few days to plan the ceremony. Of course we'll have soup, roast, and ice cream and then-- Wait. Would we live here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, we can invite all twelve of your brothers to stay with us--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? No, no, no, no, no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course we have the room. I don't know. Some of them must--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. Slow down. No one's brothers are staying here. No one is getting married.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I talk to you, please. Alone. Anna sees Hans's worried face. Hooks arms with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Whatever you have to say, you- you can say to both of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine. You can't marry a man you just met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can if it's true love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna, what do you know about true love?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than you. All you know is how to shut people out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked for my blessing, but my answer is no. Now, excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty, if I may ease your--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you may not. And I-I think you should go. Elsa walks away. As she passes the Royal Handler--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The party is over. Close the gates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Elsa, no. No, wait! Anna grabs Elsa's hand. She pulls off Elsa's glove. Elsa gasps, spins around and reaches for the glove in panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me my glove! Anna holds the glove away from Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa, please. Please. I can't live like this anymore. Elsa fights tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Then leave. Elsa sees Anna's hurt face. It's too much. She can't hold it in. She turns and rushes away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...What did I ever do to you?! The party goes silent as everyone watches the sisters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough, Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Why? Why do you shut me out?! Why do you shut the world out?! What are you so afraid of?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said, enough!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Ice shoots from Elsa's hand, spikes across the floor! Guests cry out in shock, back away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sorcery. I knew there was something dubious going on here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa...? Elsa rushes out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. COURTYARD -- NIGHT Elsa bursts out of the castle door. The CITIZENS CHEER!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There she is. Your Majesty! Long live the Queen! Queen Elsa.... Come drink with us. Elsa ducks through the crowd, holding her bare hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queen Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your Majesty? Are you all right? Elsa backs away from the baby. She knocks into the fountain, grabs its edge. The waters freeze at her touch. GASPS of shock and fear sweep over the crowd. The Duke and thugs come out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There she is! Stop her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, just stay away from me. Stay away! Magic accidentally shoots from her hand and turns the staircase into ice. The thugs and the Duke fall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Monster.... Monster!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee The crowd panics. A snowstorm begins. Elsa flees. Anna runs out of the palace doors, carrying the glove.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa! Hans follows closely behind her. GATES TO THE KINGDOM: Elsa runs out of the gates and down to the water's edge. The shoreline freezes under her feet. Anna calls to her from the gates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa! Wait, please! Elsa glances back at Anna, but turns away. She tentatively steps out onto the fjord. It freezes instantly. She breaks into a run, as the water freezes over with each step.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa, stop! Anna rushes out onto the fjord ice, slips, falls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna! Hans rushes to Anna's side. Elsa reaches the far shore. She doesn't look back. She just scrambles into the mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look.... The fjord. The ice spreads out until the entire fjord is frozen, locking the ships in place. INT. CASTLE COURTYARD -- NIGHT Snow falls. Hans and Anna move through the panicking crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow? It's...snow...in July.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Are you all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Nearby, the Duke flutters about in fright.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look! It's snowing! It's snowing! The Queen has cursed this land! She must be stopped! (to his thugs) You have to go after her. Anna rushes up to the Duke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, no! The Duke hides behind his thugs and points out at Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You! Is there sorcery in you, too? Are you a monster, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No. I'm completely ordinary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right she is... (realizing how that sounds) ...in the best way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And my sister's not a monster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She nearly killed me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You slipped on ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her ice!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was an accident. She was scared. She didn't mean it. She didn't mean any of this.... Tonight was my fault. I pushed her. So I'm the one that needs to go after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Fine. Do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring me my horse, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna, no. It's too dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa's not dangerous. I'll bring her back, and I'll make this right. The Royal Handler brings Anna her horse and a cloak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm coming with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I need you here to take care of Arendelle. He sees the desperation in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...On my honor. She throws on the cloak and hops right onto the horse, coronation dress and all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I leave Prince Hans in charge!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure you can trust her? I don't want you getting hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's my sister; she would never hurt me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee She snaps the reins and rides out. Hans watches after her. The snow picks up and overtakes our view. We push through a blizzard...lose our way...then finds ourselves... EXT. HIGH UP IN THE MOUNTAINS -- NIGHT Well above the snow-line, a small figure climbs the highest peak. It's Elsa. Finally, she stops, looks around. Catches her breath and sings... "Let It Go"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elsa takes off her glove and throws it into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LET IT GO. LET IT GO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elsa creates a snowman, just like the one she made with Anna when they were children.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LET IT GO. LET IT GO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elsa lets her cape fly back into the wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: IT'S FUNNY HOW SOME DISTANCE MAKES EVERYTHING SEEM SMALL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I'M FREE! Elsa creates ice steps and climbs them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LET IT GO! LET IT GO!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! LET IT GO!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elsa slams her foot down and forms a giant snowflake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LET THE STORM RAGE ON.... In a flurry of creative release, she raises the snowflake on ice beams, builds walls, archways, a glistening chandelier, and an intricate ceiling that leaves the sky visible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: MY POWER FLURRIES THROUGH THE AIR INTO THE GROUND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'M NEVER GOING BACK, (back to resolve)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! She takes down her hair and creates a new dress made of ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LET IT GO! LET IT GO!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! LET IT GO! The sun rises. Elsa struts onto out onto a balcony and into the light. She's free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THAT PERFECT GIRL IS GONE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She turns and slams her ice palace door on us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. THE FJORD FOREST -- DAY Anna rides her horse through two feet of snow. She shivers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa! Elsa! It's me, Anna...your sister who didn't mean to make you freeze the summer. I'm sorry. It's all my f-f-f-f-f-f-fault.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER: Anna and the horse struggle through a wooded area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, none of this would have happened if she'd just told me her secret...ha...she's a stinker. A branch of a nearby tree snaps and startles the horse. Anna goes flying off, lands face down in the snow. She sits up. Spits out snow. Sees the horse running away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no. No. No. No. Come back. No. No. No. No.... Oooo-kay. He doesn't come back. Anna grabs onto a branch of a leaning conifer, tries to pull herself to her feet, but the tree snaps upright and releases all its snow onto her. GROAN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MOUNTAIN -- NIGHT The Northern Lights shine as Anna struggles, out of breath, reaching the top of a hill. 39 FROZEN - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow, it had to be snow, she couldn't have had tr-tr-tropical magic that covered the f-f-fjords in white sand and warm -- She sees smoke rising up in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire! WHOA! Anna goes tumbling down the hill. She lands with a crash in an icy stream at the bottom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cold, cold, cold, cold, cold... EXT. A SMALL BUILDING AND STABLE -- NIGHT Anna shuffles up to the building, her dress frozen stiff. She shakes the snow off a sign and reads:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wandering Oaken's Trading Post. Snow drops off a smaller sign. She reads it, happily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh! And Sauna... INT. WANDERING OAKEN'S TRADING POST & SAUNA -- NIGHT Anna steps cautiously through the door--which hits her frozen butt and knocks her into the center of the shop. She looks around, sees only summer supplies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoo hoo. Anna turns to see a bright-faced fellow sitting low behind the counter, fingers tapping tip to tip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Big summer blow out. Half off swimming suits, clogs, and a sun balm of my own invention, yah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, great. For now, how about boots. Winter boots...and dresses?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That would be in our winter department. The winter department contains one outfit, a pick ax, and a lonely pair of boots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Um, I was just wondering; has another young woman, the Queen perhaps, I don't know, passed through here? She brings the clothes and boots to the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only one crazy enough to be out in this storm is you, dear? The front door suddenly blows open and in walks a mass of a man covered in ice. Underneath is KRISTOFF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You and this fellow.... Hoo hoo. Big summer blow out. Kristoff walks right up to Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carrots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behind you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, right. Excuse me. Anna moves out of Kristoff's way. He grabs a bunch of carrots, tosses them on the counter, then moves through the place, gathering other supplies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A real howler in July, yah? Where ever could it be coming from?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The North Mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: North Mountain. Kristoff brings his supplies to the counter. Oaken counts on his fingertips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That'll be forty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forty? No, ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh dear, that's no good. See these are from our winter stock, where supply and demand have a big problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living. Kristoff motions out the window, where we see the blocks of ice on his sled, covered in snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really... (he shoots her a look) Ahem. That's unfortunate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still forty. But I will throw in a visit to Oaken's sauna. Hoo hoo! Hi, family. Kristoff and Anna turn to see a naked family waving through the window of the steaming sauna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hoo hoo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Ten's all I got. Help me out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten will get you this and no more. Kristoff seethes. Stalemate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, just tell me one thing; what was happening on the North Mountain? Did it seem magical? Kristoff pulls down his scarf and gives Anna a firm answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Now, back up while I deal with this crook here. Oaken stands up, revealing his seven-foot stature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you call me? EXT. WANDERING OAKEN'S TRADING POST AND SAUNA -- NIGHT Oaken stomps out the door, carrying Kristoff with one arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Okay, I'm- Ow! Whoa! Oaken throws Kristoff, who face-plants in the snow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye bye. Oaken slams the door. Kristoff sits up. His reindeer, Sven, canters over, snorts, and nudges him, expectantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No Sven, I didn't get your carrots. Sven huffs in his face. Kristoff turns away and sees something. He points to a dilapidated barn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I did find us a place to sleep. And it's free. INT. WANDERING OAKEN'S TRADING POST AND SAUNA -- NIGHT Anna stands watching Oaken and all his great height as he squeezes behind the counter and sits down low again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry about this violence. I will add a quart of lutefisk, so we'll have good feelings. Just the outfit and boots, yah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Anna looks between Kristoff's supplies and the door. CUT TO: INT. OAKEN'S STABLES - NIGHT Kristoff, now unfrozen, relaxes on a bed of hay, playing his lute and singing to (and for) Sven. "Reindeer(s) are Better than People"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & CURSE YOU & CHEAT YOU.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (speaking) Oh, thanks, Buddy. (singing, as Kristoff)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ? (As Sven)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (As Kristoff)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LET'S CALL IT A NIGHT. (As Sven)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (As Kristoff)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The door opens. Anna enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice duet. Kristoff sits up with a start...sees who it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's just you. What do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you to take me up the North Mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't take people places. He lays back down, closes his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me rephrase that... A sack of supplies lands in Kristoff's lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Umph. He sits up. Looks in the bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take me up the North Mountain.... Please. He eyes her. He clearly doesn't take orders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I know how to stop this winter. He considers, lies back down, pulls his hat over his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We leave at dawn.... And you forgot the carrots for Sven. A bag of carrots hits Kristoff in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ugh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops. Sorry. Sorry. I'm sorry. I didn't-- (catching herself) We leave now. Right now. She steps back outside and waits, anxiously. Annoyed, Kristoff offers Sven a carrot. Sven has a bite. Then Kristoff has a bite, contemplating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MOUNTAIN HIGH -- NIGHT Sven races, top speed, up a narrow cliff, pulling the sled, which skids precariously. Kristoff mans the reins. Anna sits beside him. 45 FROZEN - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on! We like to go fast!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like fast! Anna leans back and puts her feet up on the dashboard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, whoa! Get your feet down. He pushes her feet down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is fresh lacquer. Seriously, were you raised in a barn? Kristoff spits on the dash to clean it. The spit flies back and hits Anna in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ew. No, I was raised in a castle. She wipes off her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So tell me, what made the Queen go all ice-crazy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Oh well, it was all my fault. I got engaged but then she freaked out because I'd only just met him, you know, that day. And she said she wouldn't bless the marriage--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. You got engaged to someone you just met?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Anyway, I got mad and so she got mad and then she tried to walk away, and I grabbed her glove--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on. You mean to tell me you got engaged to someone you just met?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Pay attention. But the thing is she wore the gloves all the time, so I just thought, maybe she has a thing about dirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't your parents ever warn you about strangers? Anna eyes Kristoff up and down, then slides away from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, they did.... But Hans is not a stranger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah? What's his last name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Of-the-Southern-Isles?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's his favorite food?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sandwiches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Best friend's name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably John.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eye color.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dreamy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foot size...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foot size doesn't matter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you had a meal with him yet? What if you hate the way he eats? What if you hate the way he picks his nose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Picks his nose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And eats it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, sir. He's a prince.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All men do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ew. Look it doesn't matter; it's true love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't sound like true love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you some sort of love expert?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. But I have friends who are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have friends who are love experts.... I'm not buying it. Sven suddenly stops, ears perked in alarm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no. I'd like to meet these-- Kristoff clamps his hand over Anna's mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean it. SHHH. Kristoff stands, looks into the dark woods surrounding them. Sensing something behind them, he holds up his lantern. Its light reflects off...EYES. Several.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sven, go. Go! Sven takes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wolves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Flashes of white dart through the woods. Kristoff hops into the back of the sled, grabs a torch. Lights it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wolves. What do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got this. You just...don't fall off and don't get eaten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I wanna help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I don't trust your judgement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me?! A wolf jumps at them, but Kristoff kicks it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who marries a man she just met? Anna grabs the lute, swings it right at Kristoff's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's true love! He screams, as she...BAM!...swings past Kristoff and knocks a wolf away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa. Just then Kristoff is yanked off the sled by another wolf. The torch goes flying. Anna catches it, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christopher! Kristoff grabs onto a loose rope hanging from the back of the sled and holds on for dear life as he's dragged behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Kristoff!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee A wolf jumps on Kristoff's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AH! Anna thinks fast, uses the torch to light a blanket on fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Duck! Anna throws the flaming blanket right at him. He ducks. The blanket hits the wolves. They tumble off Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You almost set me on fire! Anna reaches out a hand, pulls Kristoff back onto the sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I didn't. Sven cries out. There is a massive gorge ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get ready to jump, Sven!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't tell him what to do! Kristoff shoves a satchel into her arms then scoops her up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do! Kristoff tosses Anna onto Sven, then unhooks Sven's harness from the sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jump, Sven! Sven jumps the gorge with Anna on his back. Kristoff goes flying off behind them, still on the sled. Anna and Sven land safely on the other side of the gorge. Kristoff's sled loses momentum. It's not going to make it. He leaps off. He flaps his arms, claws at the air. He slams into the snowy edge of the cliff. Hanging by his hands, he looks down to see his sled hit the ground far below and burst into flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...But I just paid it off. Suddenly, he starts to slip. He claws at the loose snow, but it's clearly hopeless. He's going down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh. No, no, no. To make matters worse, an AXE comes flying right at his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AH! NO, NO, NO! The axe slams into the snow, inches from his nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grab on! Kristoff grabs on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull, Sven! Pull! REVEAL: The axe is tied to a rope, then wrapped around Sven. Anna helps Sven pull Kristoff to safety. Kristoff rolls onto his back, exhausted. Anna peeks down at the burning sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa.... I'll replace your sled and everything in it. Kristoff groans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I understand if you don't want to help me anymore. Anna walks off, sadly. Sven comes over and nuzzles Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course I don't want to help her anymore. In fact, this whole thing has ruined me for helping anyone ever again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But she'll die on her own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can live with that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Through their conversation, they watch Anna go the wrong way...turn, go the other wrong way, turn, trip...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you won't get your new sled if she's dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You know sometimes I really don't like you. Sven licks Kristoff happily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold up. We're coming?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are?! (catching herself) I mean, sure. I'll let you tag along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. SHARP MOUNTAIN RIDGE -- DAWN Kristoff, Sven and Anna walk on a narrow rim of a mountain. DISSOLVE TO: EXT. MOUNTAIN FOREST CLEARING -- DAY As they step out of the thick trees, Anna catches sight of something far below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arendelle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's completely frozen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...But it'll be fine. Elsa will thaw it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Yeah. Now come on. This way to the North Mountain? She points straight ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More like this way. He points her finger up towards a perilously mighty mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. FROZEN WILLOW TREES -- DAY Anna, Kristoff, and Sven walk beneath frozen willows. The hanging branches glisten like Christmas lights. Sven knocks them with his antlers. They tinkle like chimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never knew winter could be so beautiful. Suddenly, a voice comes in from nowhere. We'll call that voice OLAF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It really is beautiful, isn't it? But it's so white. You know, how about a little color? Must we bleach the joy out of it all? I'm thinking like maybe some crimson, chartreuse... While this is going on, Anna and Kristoff look around for the source of the rambling. They look at Sven - could he actually be talking? Sven looks back at them, his antlers tangled in branches, just as baffled as they are. In the meantime, a nose-less snowman, Olaf, wanders up behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How `bout yellow--no, not yellow. Yellow and snow? Brrrr...no go. He stops between Kristoff and Anna. They look down at him. How did he get there? He suddenly looks up at Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Am I right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Anna SCREAMS! Reflexes take over and she kicks Olaf's head, sending it flying off his body and into Kristoff's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're creepy. Kristoff tosses the head back to Anna and they commence a game of hot potato.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Backatchya!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please don't drop me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, it's just a head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Olaf's body runs at Anna, arms waving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, we got off to a bad start.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ew, ew, the body! Anna slams Olaf's head back on the body, upside down. Olaf smiles happily, then looks confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, what am I looking at right now? Why are you hanging off the earth like a bat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Okay. Wait one second. Anna kneels in front of Olaf and rights his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooh! Thank you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I'm perfect. She looks over his innocent face, gets an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, almost. She digs into Kristoff's satchel, holds up a carrot just as Olaf turns toward her. The carrot accidentally slams all the way through his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woo! Head rush!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! Too hard. I'm sorry! I-I, I was just.... Are you okay? Olaf sees a tiny piece of carrot sticking out between his eyes. He lights up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding me? I am wonderful! I've always wanted a nose. (going cross-eyed to look at his tiny nose) So cute. It's like a little baby unicorn. Anna reaches behind Olaf to the bulk of the carrot sticking out the back of his head, and pushes it forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Hey! Whoa. (seeing his now big nose) Oh, I love it even more! Hah.... All right, let's start this thing over. Hi everyone. I'm Olaf. And I like warm hugs. Olaf opens his arms wide to Anna. That triggers a memory. It takes her a moment to place it, but then she does.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf?...That's right, Olaf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And you are?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, um...I'm Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who's the funky-looking donkey over there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's Sven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-huh. And who's the reindeer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sven. Olaf looks from Kristoff to Sven, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. They're--oh, okay.... (accepting it) Makes things easier for me. Sven tries to bite Olaf's nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. Aw, look at him tryin' to kiss my nose. (gushes) I like you, too!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf, did Elsa build you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Why? Curious, Kristoff takes one of Olaf's twig arms off, studies it. It seems to be moving in sync with his other arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know where she is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fascinating...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you think you could show us the way?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How does this work? Olaf's dismembered arm slaps Kristoff across the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop it, Sven. Trying to focus here. (to Anna) Yeah, why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell you why. We need Elsa to bring back summer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Summer? (sinking into wistfulness) Oh, I don't know why but I've always loved the idea of summer, and sun, and all things hot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? I'm guessing you don't have much experience with heat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope. But sometimes I like to close my eyes and imagine what it'd be like when summer does come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : OLAF'S FANTASY WORLD -- PERFECT SUMMER DAY Olaf walks through a grassy meadow with the sun shining behind him. He SINGS. "In Summer"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee -Olaf now lies in the sand on a beach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A DRINK IN MY HAND / MY SNOW UP AGAINST THE BURNING SAND / PROB'LY GETTING GORGEOUSLY TANNED IN SUMMER. -Olaf sails in a boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'LL FINALLY SEE A SUMMER BREEZE / BLOW AWAY A WINTER STORM / -Olaf floats in the water. All his pieces begin to separate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AND FIND OUT WHAT HAPPENS TO SOLID WATER / WHEN IT GETS WARM. -Olaf tumbles on a sandy beach with sand-snowmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AND I CAN'T WAIT TO SEE / WHAT MY BUDDIES ALL THINK OF ME / JUST IMAGINE HOW MUCH COOLER I'LL BE IN SUMMER . . ! -Olaf and the seagull break out into a tap-dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DA DA . . . DA DOO / AH BAH BAH BAH BAH BAH BOO. -Olaf and another snowman drink hot chocolate in a hot tub.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THE HOT AND THE COLD ARE BOTH SO INTENSE / PUT `EM TOGETHER, IT JUST MAKES SENSE! -Olaf tap dances with a gaggle of seagulls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: RATDADAT DAD DADA DOO . . . -Olaf bounds down a grassy hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WINTER'S A GOOD TIME TO STAY IN AND CUDDLE / BUT PUT ME IN SUMMER AND I'LL BE A... He stops at a puddle, looks down at it. Smiles. Hops over it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: HAPPY SNOWMAN! -Olaf runs with a checkered blanket that he spreads out. He relaxes and stares at the blue sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: WHEN LIFE GETS ROUGH I LIKE TO HOLD ON TO MY DREAM / OF RELAXING IN THE SUMMER SUN JUST LETTING OFF STEAM! Sven, Anna, Kristoff and Olaf have a picnic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OH THE SKY WILL BE BLUE / AND YOU GUYS'LL BE THERE TOO / WHEN I FINALLY DO WHAT FROZEN THINGS DO IN SUMMER!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna tell him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you dare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Olaf sings the final note. We swing around him and return to: REALITY. He then straightens up and smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, come on! Elsa's this way. Let's go bring back summer! Olaf grabs Anna's hand and pulls her along up the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm coming! Sven hops along, happily following them. Kristoff watches all of them like they're nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody's got to tell him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 59 FROZEN - J. Lee EXT. ARENDELLE, VILLAGE -- DAY A layer of solid ice coats everything. People huddle around weak fires. Anxiety runs high amongst the villagers and guests. We pass two CITIZENS fighting over a woodpile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No. You've got the bark facing down. The bark needs to be face-up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bark down is drier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bark up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bark down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bark up. Like a light in the dark, Hans moves through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cloak. Does anyone need a cloak?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arendelle is indebted to you, Your Highness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The castle is open. There's soup and hot glogg in the Great Hall. He hands the stack of cloaks to a guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. Pass these out. Just then the Duke approaches Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Hans, are we just expected to sit here and freeze while you give away all of Arendelle's tradable goods?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Anna has given her orders and--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's another thing; has it dawned on you that your princess may be conspiring with a wicked sorceress to destroy us all? Hans's nice eyes turn to threatening slits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not question the Princess. She left me in charge, and I will not hesitate to protect Arendelle from treason.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Treason?! Suddenly they hear the alarmed whinny of Anna's horse. It returns alone, bucking and kicking. Hans grabs its reins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa, boy. Easy. Easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Anna's horse. What happened to her? Where is she? Hans steadies the horse, looks up at the mountain. He sees all the panicked faces of the kingdom looking to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Princess Anna is in trouble. (calling out) I need volunteers to go with me to find her! Volunteers, some from Arendelle, some from other lands, rush up to offer their services.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I volunteer two men, my Lord! (quietly to his thugs) Be prepared for anything, and should you encounter the Queen, you are to put an end to this winter. Do you understand? His two thugs sneer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 61 FROZEN - J. Lee EXT. THE NORTH MOUNTAIN -- DAY Anna, Kristoff, Sven, and Olaf move through hostile terrain. Wind-swept icicles face horizontal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how exactly are you planning to stop this weather?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I am gonna talk to my sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's your plan? My ice business is riding on you talking to your sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yup. Kristoff, so stunned by her casual plan, doesn't look where he's going and ends up with an ice-spike to the nose. He stops short, GULP, moves carefully around the spike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're not at all afraid of her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would I be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I bet Elsa's the nicest, gentlest, warmest person ever. Olaf backs right into an icicle. It runs through his torso.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, look at that. I've been impaled. He laughs it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. STEEP MOUNTAIN FACE -- DAY Anna and Kristoff hit what looks like a dead end. The face of the mountain goes straight up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Kristoff looks around, sighs. Digs in his rucksack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...It's too steep. I've only got one rope, and you don't know how to climb mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Says who? Sven nudges Kristoff, who looks up to see Anna trying to climb the cliff's flat face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I'm going to see my sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to kill yourself. Kristoff watches her searching for footholds and hand-holds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't put my foot there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're distracting me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or there. How do you know Elsa even wants to see you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just blocking you out cause I gotta concentrate here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, most people who disappear into the mountains want to be alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody wants to be alone. Except maybe you--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not alone.... I have friends, remember? Anna kicks a foot above her head to catch a foot hold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean the love experts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, the love experts! Anna realizes she's stuck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Please tell me I'm almost there. REVEAL: she's only about six feet up. Her muscles shake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Does the air seem a bit thin to you up here? Kristoff smiles, getting a kick out of her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on. He pulls the rope from his bag. Just then Olaf steps out from behind a rock and waves to Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Sven? Not sure if this is going to solve the problem, but I found a staircase that leads exactly where you want it to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha ha. Thank goodness. Catch! Anna drops off the cliff. Kristoff catches her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks! That was like a crazy trust exercise. She hops down, brushes off her dress, and bounds off. Kristoff watches after her, digging her fearless pluck. EXT. BASE OF THE ICE PALACE -- DAY Anna, Kristoff, and Olaf approach Elsa's elegant ice palace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that's ice. I might cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead. I won't judge. Anna climbs the steps with Olaf. Sven tries to follow. His hooves slip out. He scrambles but can't get traction. Kristoff runs to his aide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, take it easy. I gotcha. Kristoff settles Sven back down the stairs and pats him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stay right here, buddy. Sven obediently plops his reindeer butt down and wags his tail. Kristoff climbs the stairs, admiring the ice details.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Flawless. Anna arrives at the door. Hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Knock.... (she doesn't) Just knock.... (she doesn't. To Kristoff) Why isn't she knocking...? Do you think she knows how to knock? Anna finally KNOCKS. The sound echoes inside. The ice doors slide open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha. It opened. That's a first. Anna goes to step in. Kristoff follows. She gets a thought, stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should probably wait out here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last time I introduced her to a guy, she froze everything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, it's a palace made of ice. Ice is my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bye, Sven. Olaf starts to head inside. Anna stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too, Olaf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give us a minute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. As Anna walks inside. Olaf starts counting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One...two... Kristoff joins in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three...four... INT. ELSA'S PALACE -- DAY Anna walks into a great foyer. The place is beautiful, but also eerie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa? It's me...Anna?! Anna slips. Steadies herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Elsa steps out of the shadows onto a balcony. She sees Anna, looks to her longingly. Anna can't help but be struck by Elsa's beauty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa, you look different.... It's a good different.... And this place is amazing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, I never knew what I was capable of. Anna starts to climb the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I'm so sorry about what happened. If I'd known-- Elsa backs up, away from Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's okay. You don't have to apologize.... But you should probably go, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I just got here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You belong in Arendelle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do you. Anna takes another step up. Elsa backs up more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I belong here. Alone. Where I can be who I am without hurting anybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Actually, about that--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. What is that? Olaf comes running in the front door. He waves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf? Olaf stops beside Anna, looks up at Elsa, intimidated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You built me. You remember that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you're alive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um...I think so? Anna kneels down beside Olaf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's just like the one we built as kids.... We were so close. We can be like that again. Elsa smiles, but then a memory returns to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : FLASHBACK: Young Anna is struck by Elsa's powers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna! Young Anna falls unconscious. Young Elsa races to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : THE PRESENT: Elsa's face sinks in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, we can't. Elsa turns and heads up the second story steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa, wait--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just trying to protect you. Elsa continues to flee. Anna pursues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to protect me. I'm not afraid. Please don't shut me out again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Anna SINGS. "First Time in Forever, Reprise"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: PLEASE DON'T SLAM THE DOOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . `CAUSE FOR THE FIRST TIME IN FOREVER, I FINALLY UNDERSTAND.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . `CAUSE FOR THE FIRST TIME IN FOREVER, I WILL BE RIGHT HERE. They arrive on the top floor, Elsa's main living space. Elsa turns back to Anna, grateful, but determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Elsa opens up the balcony doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: JUST STAY AWAY AND YOU'LL BE SAFE FROM ME.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Elsa looks past Anna's shoulder out white-peaked mountains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You kind of set off an eternal winter...everywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everywhere?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, you can just unfreeze it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I can't. I don't know how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure you can. I know you can. Snow starts to swirl around the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUZ FOR THE FIRST TIME IN FOREVER, ELSA (panicking)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The snow picks up. Anna tries to fight through it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: IC.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... But as Anna sings, we lose sight of her in the thickening blizzard taking over the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Anna's voice disappears in the storm as Elsa cries out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Elsa's fear, so strong, sucks the blizzard back into her and then it bursts out, unwittingly, like a sharp snowflake. Anna is STRUCK right in the heart. She grasps her chest in pain and stumbles back. She falls to her knees. Elsa gasps when she sees Anna. Just then, Olaf and Kristoff rush into the room to Anna's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay.... I'm fine. Anna gets to her feet, determined to hide the pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's this? Wait, it doesn't matter. You have to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I know we can figure this out together--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How? What power do you have to stop this winter? To stop me? Anna doesn't have the answer. Kristoff sees spiky ice shadows creeping down the walls. Puts a protective arm around Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna, I think we should go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm not leaving without you, Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, you are. Elsa waves her arms and builds a giant, menacing snowman. We'll call him MARSHMALLOW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ICE PALACE -- DAY Marshmallow holds Anna and Kristoff by the scruff of their necks in one hand and Olaf in the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop. Put us down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are a lot stronger than I think you realize. Marshmallow tosses Kristoff and Anna down the steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go away! Anna and Kistoff slide past Sven, who's got his tongue stuck to the ice railing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads up! Olaf's head smashes into a snowbank nearby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch out for my butt! Anna and Kristoff duck as the rest of Olaf slams into the snowbank. Marshmallow turns to go back into the castle. Incensed, Anna tries to march back up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is not nice to throw people! Kristoff grabs her, pulls her back.
direction.name: direction
