direction.raw_text: Thank you. They meet eyes. Wait. Is that chemistry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Um.... How's your head? She touches the spot where he banged his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! Ooh! He catches himself. Waves off the pain with a giggle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, It's fine. Ah...I'm good. Ha. I've got a thick skull.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have a skull.... Or bones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...So.... The awkwardness is killing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now what? (then...panicking) Now what?! Oh! What am I gonna do? She threw me out. I can't go back to Arendelle with the weather like this. And then there's your ice business--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, hey, don't worry about my ice business... (noticing something) Worry about your hair?! She thinks he means it looks bad. She smooths it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? I just fell off a cliff. You should see your hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, yours is turning white. She grabs her braid as a tendril turns white.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: White? It's what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's because she struck you; isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does it look bad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...No. Olaf's head pops up. He's holding his head up off his body to join the conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You hesitated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I didn't. Anna, you need help. Now, come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee He heads towards the sunset. Sven and Olaf follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay! Where are we going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To see my friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The love experts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love experts?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. And don't worry; they'll be able to fix this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know? He looks her over, remembering the moment he saw the trolls heal her as a child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Because I've seen them do it before. As they round the bend, the sun sets and Olaf turns to Sven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like to consider myself a love expert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ELSA'S PALACE -- DAY Elsa paces, distraught. She talks to herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get it together. Control it. Don't feel. Don't feel. Don't FEEL! She hears ice cracking. Stops. Looks around. She's left a sharp wake of ice spikes behind her on the floor. They grow up the wall, taking over the castle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 80 FROZEN - J. Lee EXT. BLACK MOUNTAINS -- NIGHT The Northern Lights are bright. Olaf stares at them in awe as he rides on Sven's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, Sven. The sky's awake. Behind Olaf and Sven, Anna walks with Kristoff. She shivers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you cold?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...A little. He reaches like he might put an arm around her, but decides against it. He looks around as if he doesn't know what to do, then gets a thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. Come here. He takes her hand and pulls her around a bend into a rock- lined pass. Steam vents, powered by the volcanic activity, dot the path. He holds her hands over one of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooh.... That's nice. They continue on the path, walking from vent to vent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, about my friends...well, I say friends, they're more like family.... Anyway, when I was a kid, it was just me and Sven...until they took me in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They did?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. I don't want to scare you, they can be a little bit inappropriate...and loud...very loud...they're also stubborn at times, and a little overbearing. And heavy. Really, really heavy. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they're fine.. You'll get it. They mean well. Anna touches Kristoff's arm, reassuringly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff, they sound wonderful. Kristoff smiles, appreciating her sincerity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay then.... Mustering the courage, Kristoff steps forward and with a wave of the arms announces--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meet my family. REVEAL: he's surrounded by rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, guys! As Kristoff and Sven move through the rocks, waving and greeting, Olaf and Anna stand frozen, dumbfounded.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...They're rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's crazy. (covertly, to Anna) I'll distract them while you run. (Loud and slow to a rock) Hi, Sven's family! It's nice to meet you! (quietly to Anna) Anna, because I love you, I insist you run. (to the rock) I understand you're love experts! (to Anna) Why aren't you running? Anna snaps out of her shock and starts backing away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Um...I'm gonna go-- Just then the rocks around her start rolling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff! Olaf lights up and chases the rocks, who surround Kristoff and unfold as trolls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff! Kristoff's home! It's been too long! Kristoff's home! Olaf jumps around all excitedly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff's home. He then stops, confused, and looks to one of the trolls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait? Kristoff? Anna watches, shocked and confused. The trolls all want Kristoff's attention. One troll yanks him down with a boulder's strength.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, lemme look at you! Another troll tries to pull off his clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, take off your clothes, Kristoff; I wash them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! No. I'm gonna keep my clothes on, thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great to see you all. Where's grandpa?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's napping. But look, I grew a mushroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I earned my fire crystal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I passed a kidney stone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pick me up. The kid troll jumps up on Kristoff's arm. Kristoff sinks under the weight of him. Anna still stares, confused, then realizes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trolls? They're trolls. Silence. All troll eyes turn to Anna. Blink. Blink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...He's brought a girl!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's brought a girl! Suddenly Anna is surrounded by trolls. They body-surf/roll Anna over to Kristoff. She falls into his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've learned to just roll with it. Bulda climbs on top of her husband, Cliff, to get a good look at Anna. She studies her like she's a piece of cattle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me see. Bright eyes. Working nose. Strong teeth. Yes, yes, yes. She'll do nicely for our Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. Oh. Um. No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got the wrong idea. That's not why I brought her here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. We're not. I'm not-- Anna laughs, uncomfortable, not knowing what to say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the issue, dear? Why are you holding back from such a man? Bulda SINGS. "Fixer-Upper"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: IS IT THE CLUMPY WAY HE WALKS?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we just stop talking about this?! We've got a real, actual problem here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll say-- (To Anna)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OR THAT HE'S SOCIALLY IMPAIRED?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ARE YOU HOLDING BACK YOUR FONDNESS DUE TO HIS UNMANLY BLONDENESS?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The girl trolls sweep Anna away. The boys take Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enough! She's engaged to someone else. Okay?! TROLLS beat. Blink. Blink. The boy trolls turn, huddle...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: SO SHE'S A BIT OF A FIXER UPPER, THAT'S A MINOR THING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: SO SHE'S A BIT OF A FIXER UPPER, HER BRAIN'S A BIT BETWIXT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'CAUSE PEOPLE DON'T REALLY CHANGE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: AND YOU'LL BRING OUT THEIR BEST!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Kristoff looks over at Anna. She actually looks shockingly beautiful dressed in moss, lit by shimmering crystals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you, Anna, take Kristoff to be your trollfully wedded--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, what?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're getting married.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Just then, Anna collapses. Kristoff catches her. She's shivering something fierce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna? He pulls off her cape and hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's as cold as ice. Just then Grand Pabbie pushes his way through the crowd. Trolls clear the way for Pabbie. He stops at the edge of the pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's strange magic here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grand Pabbie!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring her to me, Kristoff. Kristoff helps Anna over. Pabbie looks into her weak eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna, your life is in danger. There is ice in your heart, put there by your sister. If not removed, to solid ice will you freeze, forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What...? No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So remove it, Grand Pabbie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't. If it was her head, that would be easy. But only an act of true love can thaw a frozen heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An act of true love?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A true love's kiss, perhaps? A bunch of trolls give each other kisses. Anna shivers again, collapsing into Kristoff's arms. More of her hair turns white.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna, we've got to get you back to Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help us out, Sven. Kristoff grabs Sven's antlers. Sven pulls them out. Kristoff helps Anna onto Sven and hops up behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Olaf! Sven takes off. Olaf grabs Sven's tail, rides with them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm coming! Let's go kiss Hans! Who is this Hans?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT.    ELSA'S PALACE - DAWN Hans and the men tread cautiously towards the castle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are here to find Princess Anna. Be on guard, but no harm is to come to the Queen. Do you understand? The Duke's thugs exchange a look. Suddenly, a mass of snow rises from the ground behind Hans. It's Marshmallow, Elsa's snow guard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go away! He slams a fist inches from Hans. Hans deftly dodges out of the way. All of the guards take up arms against Marshmallow, who quickly knocks them over. Marshmallow throws down a guard and his horse, who topple over Hans. Marshmallow raises his foot to stomp on Hans, but Hans barrel-rolls himself to safety. He sees his sword, leaps, and grabs it. Just then, Elsa peeks out the front doors. The Duke's two thugs see her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Queen. The thugs charge up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee INT. ELSA'S PALACE -- DAY They guards burst through the ice doors. Elsa flees to the top floor of her palace. The guards pursue. They trap her on the top floor, raise their crossbows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Please. One of the thugs shoots an arrow right at Elsa. At the last moment she creates an ice wall. It stops the arrow, inches from her face. The thugs reposition to take another shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay away! Elsa shoots ice at the thugs. They duck out of the way and continue the attack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get her! Get her! Elsa fights for her life. BACK OUTSIDE: Hans is nearly crushed by Marshmallow. He rolls away. Jumps to his feet. And with agile might, he slices Marshmallow's leg off with his sword. Marshmallow stumbles back, off balance. And falls off over the cliff, but not before striking Hans. Hans goes over the edge. REVEAL: Hans clings to the ice steps. His men help him up and they rush into the ice palace. INT. ICE PALACE -- DAY Elsa is surrounded. It's do or die. In two swift moves, Elsa traps one thug in a cage of spikes that threaten his neck. The other she pushes back with a wall of ice....up against the balcony doors...which BURST and CRACK. OUT ONTO THE BALCONY.... The balcony doors shatter. The thug is pushed to the edge. He's inches away from falling to his death. BACK INSIDE: Hans and his men run in. See the destruction and the thugs near death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Queen Elsa! Don't be the monster they fear you are. Elsa snaps out of her rage. She sees the men, frightened, moments from death. She stops. Elsa looks to Hans, overwhelmed, frightened. The wall retreats from the thug on the balcony. The ice spikes lower from the second thug's neck. He takes advantage and aims his crossbow at Elsa's back. Seeing it. Hans runs and pushes the crossbow up just as the arrow releases. The arrow hits the ice chandelier, hanging directly above Elsa. The chandelier comes CRASHING DOWN. Elsa dives out of the way but she falls in the blast. All we see is ice smashing like glass, and all we hear is the sound of it shattering as it rings out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FADE IN ON: Elsa's face as her eyes flutter open. She sits up. She's surrounded by stone. INT. ARENDELLE, DUNGEON -- DAY Elsa looks to the nearby window. Tries to rush to it. She's pulled taut by giant shackles that fit like iron gloves. She's chained to the wall. Elsa strains to looks out a window... INSET WINDOW: Arendelle is outside, frozen solid and getting further buried under the ice and snow that is falling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No....What have I done? Hans enters. He hangs a torch by the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you bring me here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't just let them kill you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I'm a danger to Arendelle. Get Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna has not returned.... Elsa looks to the storm with worry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you would just stop the winter, bring back summer...please. Elsa meets his eyes, desperate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you see...I can't. Hans sees the sincerity in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to tell them to let me go. Hans walks to the door. He takes the torch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will do what I can. He opens the door and leaves. Elsa, distraught, hears cracking. She looks down as her shackles begin to freeze over. The storm outside picks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. THE FJORDS -- DAY Sven charges down the mountain with Kristoff and Anna on his back. Olaf slides along beside them, penguin-style. Anna shivers in Kristoff's arms. She's weakening. Kristoff takes off his hat and puts it on her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just hang in there. (to Sven) Come on, buddy, faster! They arrive at the walls of Arendelle. Olaf slides past them, out of control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll meet you guys at the castle!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay out of sight, Olaf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will! He disappears into the village streets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! It's alive!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. CASTLE COURTYARD -- DAY Guards see Kristoff and Anna approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Princess Anna! Sven skids to a stop outside the gates. Kristoff slides off, holding Anna, and carries her to the gate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got you. Anna looks up at him, gratefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Are you g-gonna be okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about me. Just then the castle gates open. Gerda, Kai, and a handmaid rush to help Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna! Oh, you had us worried sick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My Lady. You are freezing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You poor girl, you're freezing. Let's get you inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get her warm and find Prince Hans, immediately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We will. Thank you. Anna is swept away from Kristoff and into the palace grounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Make sure she's safe! Kristoff is shut out as the castle gates close on him. Kristoff stands there with Sven for a beat, staring with worry at the closed gates. Finally, he sighs, turns and walks off. Sven reluctantly follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. LIBRARY -- DAY Hans stands with the dignitaries and guards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going back out to look for Princess Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot risk going out there again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If anything happens to her--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If anything happens to the Princess, you are all Arendelle has left. Hans hesitates, realizing how much this kingdom has come to depend on him. Is he really all they have left? Just then the door opens and Gerda and Kai bring in Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in here. Prince Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Hans rushes to Anna. She falls into his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're so cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hans, you have to kiss me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. Here we go. She tries to kiss him, but is too weak to pull herself up in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll give you two some privacy. Everyone shuffles out, leaving Hans and Anna alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened out there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa struck me with her powers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said she'd never hurt you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was wrong. Anna crumbles, weak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Hans carries her to a couch, sets her down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She froze my heart and only an act of true love can save me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A true love's kiss. He takes her chin in his hand and gives her a tender smile. He leans in slowly...gently...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Then he stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Anna. If only there was someone out there who loved you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Hans gets up, leaving her there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You said you did. He goes to the window and shuts the curtains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As thirteenth in line in my own kingdom, I didn't stand a chance. I knew I'd have to marry into the throne somewhere--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As heir, Elsa was preferable, of course. But no one was getting anywhere with her. But you-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hans?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were so desperate for love you were willing to marry me, just like that. Hans crosses the room, grabs a pitcher of water from a table and goes to the fireplace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I figured, after we married, I'd have to stage a little accident for Elsa. Hans pours the water on the fireplace, putting out the fire. Anna tries to stop him. She falls to the floor, weak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hans. No, stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But then she doomed herself, and you were dumb enough to go after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All that's left now is to kill Elsa and bring back summer. Hans approaches Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You're no match for Elsa. He bends down, takes her chin in his hand again, this time not so gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're no match for Elsa. I, on the other hand, am the hero who is going to save Arendelle from destruction. She wrenches her face out of his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You won't get away with this. Hans rises and crosses to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I already have. Hans leaves and shuts her in, locking the door. Anna struggles to the door, yanks on the locked handle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, somebody help. The rest of her hair turns white and she crumbles to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 97 FROZEN - J. Lee INT. COUNCIL CHAMBER -- NIGHT The Duke looks out the window at the growing snowstorm. He rubs his arms and shivers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's getting colder by the minute. If we don't do something soon, we'll all freeze to death. Hans comes in, putting on his most distraught face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Anna is...dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What...? No.... Mon dieu. Hans stumbles, weak with grief. The men help him to a chair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was killed by Queen Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her own sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least we got to say our marriage vows...before she died in my arms. He bows his head in a brilliant display of teary grief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There can be no doubt now; Queen Elsa is a monster and we are all in grave danger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prince Hans, Arendelle looks to you. Hans nods; he knows what he's being asked to do, and he'll do it with the perfect amount of authority and gravitas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With a heavy heart, I charge Queen Elsa of Arendelle with treason and sentence her to death. INT. ELSA'S DUNGEON -- DAY The cell ices over. Elsa looks out at the storm that is devastating Arendelle, then hears the guards approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's dangerous. Move quickly and with resolve. Elsa pulls at her shackles. They crack. Just as the door busts open, the weight of the ice crumbles the walls. The men duck out of the way. Hans pushes his way into the room...sees... The back wall is blown open. Broken shackles rest on the floor. Elsa is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MOUNTAIN SLOPE -- DAY Kristoff heads into the mountains. Sven lags behind, not wanting to follow. He looks back at the kingdom, then shakes his head. Enough. He runs past Kristoff. Stops and turns to face him. He snorts and grunts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it, buddy? Sven nudges Kristoff with his antlers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, watch it. What's wrong with you? Sven snorts with more conviction, moos, brays.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I don't understand you when you talk like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Kristoff tries to walk on ahead, but Sven uses his antlers to lift Kristoff off the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! Stop it! Put me down! Sven drops him hard then "yells" at him once more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Sven! We're not going back! Sven shakes his head, angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's with her true love. Sven makes an "of-course-she-isn't" face. Kristoff gets it; he's made his point. Just then the wind picks up. Kristoff looks back at the kingdom. Sees a violent winter storm swirling over the castle. Sharp ice claws its way up the castle, encasing it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Without hesitating, he dashes back down the mountain. Sven runs after him, catches up. Kristoff grabs Sven's harness and jumps onto his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. LIBRARY -- NIGHT Anna shivers by the door. She looks up to see ice overtaking the ceiling. The door handle suddenly jiggles. Stops. Jiggles again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help. CLICK. The door swings open. We see a carrot in the lock and hear a giggle of victory. Olaf takes the carrot, puts it back on his face. Then he sees Anna lying there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Oh no. He runs to the fireplace. Throws in some fresh wood, including one of his own arms, which he quickly rescues, before striking a match and relighting the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf? Olaf. Get away from there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! So this is heat.... (considering) I love it. He reaches a twig finger toward the flames. It catches on fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh! But don't touch it! He shakes the flame out, as he rushes over to help Anna to the fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, where's Hans? What happened to your kiss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was wrong about him. It wasn't true love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh. But we ran all the way here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please Olaf, you can't stay here; you'll melt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am not leaving here until we find some other act of true love to save you. He sits down behind her, stubbornly. Leans his back against hers and thinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Do you happen to have any ideas?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't even know what love is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's okay, I do.... Olaf hops back up and puts a soothing hand on her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love is...putting someone else's needs before yours, like, you know, how Kristoff brought you back here to Hans and left you forever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Kristoff loves me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, you really don't know anything about love, do you? His face starts to melt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Olaf, you're melting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some people are worth melting for. But then...his face REALLY melts. He panics, pushes the snow back in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just maybe not right this second. Suddenly, the window blows open, cold wind sweeps in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, I've got it! Olaf flitters to the window. He pulls one panel of it shut but struggles with the second panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to get through-- (distracted) Oh, wait. Hang on. I'm getting something. He breaks an icicle off the window, uses it as a telescope and sees... Kristoff and Sven running back down the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Kristoff and Sven! They're coming back this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...They-they are?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, he's really moving fast. Huh.... I guess I was wrong. I guess Kristoff doesn't love you enough to leave you behind. Anna tries to get to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help me up, Olaf. Please. He hurries over, tumbling over the couch, knocking over the chess set and water jugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no, no, no. You need to stay by the fire and keep warm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to get to Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why...? (realizing) Oh, oh, oh, I know why. He hops around in an excited display of hope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's your act of true love, right there, riding across the fjords like a valiant, pungent reindeer king! Come on! The walls crack under the ice pressure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out! They rush out the room just as the ceiling collapses. INT. CASTLE HALLWAY -- DAY Anna and Olaf struggle down the hall. Ice spikes grow and block their path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're trapped. Anna looks around desperately for a way out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee EXT. FJORD -- DAY Elsa runs, but is nearly blinded by the snow and wind. EXT. CASTLE -- DAY Anna and Olaf bust open a window. The storm is so strong it sweeps the window panes away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slide, Anna. It's a long, snowy way down. But what choice do they have? They slide down the iced-covered building. Anna arrives at the bottom, weak but uninjured. Olaf gathers snow along the way. He arrives at the bottom as a giant snowball.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We made it! He shakes off the extra snow as Anna struggles to her feet. EXT. FJORD -- DAY Kristoff and Sven bound off the mountain and sprint across the frozen fjord waters and right into the heart of the storm. Its white-out wind pushes them back. But they fight through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, buddy, faster.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Anna and Olaf reach the shore of the fjords.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff! The wind lifts Olaf up and pulls him apart. He goes swirling off into the storm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep going, Anna! Anna struggles on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: TO: Kristoff rides Sven past cracking, frozen ships. Sven struggles over the uneven surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Come on! Suddenly, a mangled ship, risen by ice, capsizes   over them. They give it all they've got as debris falls all   around them and the mast shatters. They make it past just as   the entire ship slams down and cracks the thick ice beneath   their feet. The ice opens up. Sven bravely jumps over a gap. But it's too wide. He bucks Kristoff to safety, but lands in the freezing water and disappears below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sven? Sven! At first there's nothing but the wind and the tumbling icy water. But suddenly, Sven surfaces and claws his way to a floating ice chunk. He calls out, signalling for Kristoff to go on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Anna moves blindly across the fjord. Anna's hands frost over an icy blue. She stumbles on, determined. But she's running out of time. She clutches her chest. The color in her eyes fades, the inevitable is coming. CUT TO: Kristoff, lost in the white-out, doesn't know which way to turn. But then he hears a faint--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna...? Anna!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Elsa struggles through her own storm, but the fear is consuming her. A dark shadow approaches. It's Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa. You can't run from this! Elsa backs away from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Just take care of my sister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your sister? She returned from the mountain weak and cold. She said you froze her heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried to save her, but it was too late. Her skin was ice. Her hair turned white... Elsa's face sinks as she realizes what she has done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your sister is dead... because of you. Elsa drops to her knees, emotionally broken. And with that, the swirling storm suddenly stops. The snow freezes mid-air, hangs suspended, trapped in grief. Citizens and dignitaries rush to the wall's edge and look out to see... Anna, barely able to move but now able to see across the fjords to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kristoff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna. Anna pushes on towards Kristoff. He runs top speed towards her. There's still a lot of fjord to cross, but Kristoff is giving it all he's got. He's going to make it. But then, Anna hears the sound of a sword being drawn from its scabbard. She turns and sees Hans, behind Elsa, as he raises his sword over his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa. Anna looks back at Kristoff as he runs for her. She gives him a longing look, but then turns away from him and then... Using all of her remaining strength, as Hans brings his sword down, Anna throws herself in front of Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! In that instant, Anna freezes to solid ice. The sword hits her instead of Elsa. The sword shatters completely. The force of it sends Hans flying back and knocks him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna! Elsa rushes to Anna and touches her sister's frozen face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Anna...no...no, please no. Olaf walks up and sees Anna, frozen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna? Elsa hugs Anna and cries. Kristoff watches in shocked despair. Sven steps up to his side. Citizens and dignitaries on the castle walls bow their heads. All of Arendelle is joined in somber silence. But then, Anna warms. She begins to thaw. Olaf looks up and gasps. Kristoff and Sven notice, light up. Anna bends her arm and embraces Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wha-? Anna? Anna opens her eyes. She smiles at Elsa, relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Elsa. They embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...You sacrificed yourself for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I love you. Olaf realizes what's happened. He's so excited about it, he lifts his head right off his body and exclaims--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An act of true love will thaw a frozen heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love...will thaw... (realizing) Love.... Of course. Elsa looks at Anna with confidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elsa?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love. Elsa lifts her arms, and the ground shakes and cracks. The ice and snow breaks away and rises high into the air. Beneath their feet the bow of a ship thaws. The entire fjord melts and other boats right themselves. The villagers come out to see the warmth returning. In one final wave, Elsa draws all of the snow into a giant snowflake in the sky, then waves it away, leaving only a warm summer day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew you could do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hands down, this is the best day of my life...and quite possibly the last.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Olaf. Hang on, little guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Elsa waves her hand and surrounds Olaf with a swirl of cold air. He refreezes. Above his head she leaves a little, perpetually-snowing storm cloud. Olaf loves it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, my own personal flurry. Kristoff sees Hans trying to get to his feet. He marches toward him, prepared for a fight. But Anna puts up a hand and stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh. Uh. Uh. She'll handle this. She goes over to Hans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna? But she froze your heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only frozen heart around here is yours. She turns away from him, proud of her words. But not yet satisfied, she turns back and punches him right in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah! Whoa, whoa, whoa! He falls overboard. Elsa comes over to Anna and hugs her. Over her shoulder, Kristoff meets Anna's eyes. She smiles brighter, happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ARENDELLE -- DAY It's a beautiful summer day. The mighty ships have been repaired and are sailing away. On one of the ships, HANS is thrown into a brig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will return this scoundrel to his country. We shall see what his twelve big brothers think of his behavior.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arendelle thanks you, my Lord.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Down on the dock, Arendelle guards lead the Duke and his two thugs to their ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is unacceptable. I am innocent. I'm a victim of fear. I've been traumatized. (bad acting) Ow! My neck hurts. Is there a doctor I could...No? And I demand to see the Queen! Kai steps down from the gangplank to the dock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a message from the Queen. (reading a scroll) Arendelle will henceforth and forever no longer do business of any sort with Weaseltown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weselton. It's Weselton! The guards usher him and his thugs onto their ship. EXT. VILLAGE SQUARE -- DAY Anna runs through the crowd, pulling a blindfolded Kristoff along behind her. She's so excited she can't stand it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on! She runs him right into a pole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops. Sorry. EXT. ARENDELLE DOCKS -- DAY Anna skips to the perfect spot and stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Okay. Here we are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee She takes off the blindfold. Kristoff opens his eyes. Before him sits the most beautiful, suped-up sled. Sven poses in front of it -- Vanna White-style.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I owe you a sled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you serious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. And it's the latest model.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I can't accept this...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to. No returns. No exchanges. Queen's orders. She's named you the official Arendelle Ice Master and Deliverer. Sven shows off the Ice-Master-and-Deliverer medal like he's king of the bucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? That's not a thing. But he can't help but admire her enthusiasm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure it is. And it even has a cup holder.... Do you like it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like it? He sweeps her up high overhead and spins her around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love it.... I could kiss you! He drops her, suddenly embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I could. I mean I'd like to. I'd... may I? We me....I mean, may we? Wait, what? She gives him a quick kiss on the cheek.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We may.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee He smiles and goes for it. It's a true love's kiss, alright. We move past them to find Olaf enjoying the summer. With his snow cloud safely overhead, he's free to smell the flowers, which he does. Then sneezes his carrot nose off. Sven catches it between his teeth. Olaf gasps as Sven sucks the whole carrot into his mouth. It's gone. Olaf's face sinks in sadness. But not to fear, Sven spits the carrot back out and jams it into Olaf's face where it belongs. It's completely covered in reindeer spit, but Olaf doesn't seem to mind. He hugs Sven happily. CUT TO: EXT. CASTLE COURTYARD -- DAY The gates to the castle are wide open. In the courtyard, stands Elsa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you ready? Villagers cheer. Elsa stops and creates an ice rink. The people, skates at the ready, hope onto it and twirl about. Elsa then freezes the fountain in a beautiful design and adds some snow flurries for atmosphere. Anna comes slipping in. Elsa catches her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like the open gates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are never closing them again. Elsa then waves her hand and magical ice skates (literally made of ice) form on Anna's boots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Oh, Elsa, they're beautiful, but you know I don't ska-- Elsa grabs Anna's hands and pulls her along on the ice. Anna slips and slides, but laughs in delight. Sven goes slipping past. Kristoff runs after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look out. Reindeer coming through!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - J. Lee Olaf skates and helps Elsa coach Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it. Glide and pivot and glide and pivot. We pull away slowly, into the sky. We arrive at a bird's-eye view to see that where the castle had crumbled has been repaired with a ice. All is right in Arendelle.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: By this time Kristoff and Anna are being ushered into a pit by the sheer force of numbers.
